title: nArrative Patterns
text: Consider how early societies might have used stories as a key form of communication and knowledge transfer.

title: Biological Predisposition
text: Think about the evolutionary advantages that might arise from humans developing storytelling skills.

title: Engagement and Memory
text: Reflect on why stories might be more memorable and engaging compared to simple data presentation.

title: Social Interaction
text: Consider how storytelling has played a role in social bonding and community building through history.
